mapper.select: select * from notice where notice_category = 'notice' order by notice_id * 1

select n.notice_id, n.user_id, n.notice_title, n.notice_body, n.notice_cre_date, n.notice_grade, i.image_file from notice as n inner join image as i on n.notice_id = i.image_match_id where notice_category = 'comment' and n.product_id = #{product_id} order by n.notice_cre_date asc
select * from notice where product_id = #{product_id} and notice_category = 'PQA' order by notice_cre_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_id, user_id, notice_category, notice_title, notice_body, notice_cre_date, product_id, notice_match_no, notice_parent_no) values(concat('notice_', nextval('notice')), #{user_id}, 'PQA', #{notice_title}, #{notice_body}, now(), #{product_id}, '0', '0');
